text: Guftand (faristagon): Ej Lut, mo firistodagoni Parvardigori tu hastem, firistoda sudaem, to in ki qavmatro halok kunem! Inho hargiz ʙa tu naxohand rasid. Cun qisme az saʙ ʙigzarad, xonadoni xesro az in deha ʙerun ʙiʙar. Ba hec jak az sumo ʙa qafo nanigarad, cuz hamsarat, ki (kofira ast) ʙa u niz on ci ʙa onho rasad, xohad rasid. Va'dai onho suʙhgoh ast. Lut xost, ki zudtar halokason kunad, vale faristagon guftand: Ojo suʙh nazdik nest
